divs: Sighting Detailsi was standing outside on my balcony and observed a grayish looking light that was moving all around the sky...i called my husband to come look with me and also the neighbor was there as well downstairs....so the ball moved around for like 1-2 mins in the same spot then it took off to the northwest in the sky really fast...
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around April 14th 2013
